summary: Completed frontend testing for Le Court Central Tennis App - Apple-style wheel pickers. All requested features verified working correctly: app loads, calendar selection works, FAB button opens add event modal, and all three Apple-style wheel pickers (AppleOptionPicker, AppleDatePicker, AppleTimePicker) are present and functional.

issues: FAB button click can be intercepted by week cards behind it - requires precise clicking at coordinates (1872, 888)
data-testid='add-event-btn' not found in DOM - may need to verify React Native Web rendering

critical_code_review_comments: Apple-style wheel pickers (WheelPicker, AppleTimePicker, AppleDatePicker, AppleOptionPicker) are correctly implemented
Time picker correctly shows 5-minute increments (00, 05, 10, 15, etc.)
Date picker is wheel-based without manual text input
Event type picker shows wheel with 3 visible options (1 selected, 2 grayed)
All pickers follow Apple iOS design pattern with 3 visible items
FAB button has zIndex: 999 but may still be intercepted by underlying elements in some cases
context_for_next_testing_agent: Apple-style wheel pickers are working correctly. The add event modal can be opened by clicking the blue FAB button at coordinates (1872, 888) on a 1920x1080 viewport. The modal contains: 1) AppleOptionPicker for event type, 2) AppleDatePicker for date selection, 3) AppleTimePicker with 5-minute increments. All pickers show 3 visible options with the middle one selected and top/bottom grayed out.
